name: Show-hide-nav-js
tagline: Show / Hide a menu using only pure JavaScript
body:
Going to try to turn this into a demo page.

##This is a title

Adding some text in the mix to create some content on the page. See how that will turn out. Terribly probably, but if this works, it will all be replaced by better stuff.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
